input.subject: Quote ready for Jolie Ni (SF -> NYC)
input.body: Quote summary: $7,800 base; packing +$650; boxes +$200; basic insurance included.

output.subject: Your moving quote for SF to NYC
output.body:
Hi Jolie,

Here is your quote for the San Francisco -> New York move:
- Base move: $7,800 (load/haul/delivery)
- Add-ons: packing +$650, boxes +$200
- Insurance: basic included; upgraded options available on request

Delivery address: If your NYC address isn't final yet, please share it to avoid storage. If goods arrive before we have it, your items will go into storage and storage charges will apply until you provide the address.

Please reply to approve or request changes, confirm your insurance choice, and confirm whether you want packing and boxes.

Thanks,
Gullie Agent

input.subject: Quote ready for Samir Patel (LA -> Seattle)

output.subject: Your moving quote for LA to Seattle
output.body:
Hi Samir,

Quote for your Los Angeles -> Seattle move:
- Base move: $5,950 (boxes included)

- Insurance: basic included; upgraded +$150

Delivery address: If this isn't final yet, please provide it to avoid storage. If goods arrive before we have it, we'll place them in storage and storage charges will apply until you share the address.

Please reply to approve or request changes, confirm which insurance tier you want, and confirm whether you want packing (boxes are included).

Thanks,
Gullie Agent
